name: 17alpha,21-dihydroxypregnenolone:oxygen oxidoreductase (11-hydroxylating)
definition: 17alpha,21-Dihydroxypregnenolone + 2 Reduced ferredoxin + Oxygen + 2 H+ <=> 11beta,17alpha,21-Trihydroxypregnenolone + 2 Oxidized ferredoxin + H2O
comment: Oxidized ferredoxin is reduced by NADPH (see R01195)
